create(Customers) - Method in class com.skillstorm.hotel.controllers.CustomerController
Creates a new customer using the raw JSON sent to the servlet using a Post request.
create(Reservations) - Method in class com.skillstorm.hotel.controllers.ReservationController
Creates a new reservation using the raw JSON sent to the servlet using a Post request.
CustomerController - Class in com.skillstorm.hotel.controllers
Controller class to send and receive HTTP Requests, which allow a web server to query the MySQL database, and uses the methods specified in the CustomerService class.
CustomerController() - Constructor for class com.skillstorm.hotel.controllers.CustomerController
 
CustomerRepository - Interface in com.skillstorm.hotel.repositories
Repository class to take care of JDBC queries sent to MySQL for the customers table.
Customers - Class in com.skillstorm.hotel.models
This is the models class for the customers table in MySQL.
Customers() - Constructor for class com.skillstorm.hotel.models.Customers
Basic constructor for the class.

Constructor for each variable to be input in the parameter.
Customers(String, String, String, String, int) - Constructor for class com.skillstorm.hotel.models.Customers
Constructor that takes every variable aside from customerId in the parameter.
CustomerService - Interface in com.skillstorm.hotel.services
An interface class which allows the CustomerServiceImpl class to function.
CustomerServiceImpl - Class in com.skillstorm.hotel.services
Service class for customers which implements the methods in the CustomerService interface, and executes the queries using the CustomerRepository interface.
CustomerServiceImpl() - Constructor for class com.skillstorm.hotel.services.CustomerServiceImpl
